lines.text: You have to make an acrobatics check to try and get through this now because you have very little space to move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Luck again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. You manage to make your way halfway across the room, dodging out of the way as these pillars are slamming and retracting. Kind of use the pattern of when they're pulling down from the ceiling, but they're moving very fast. One of them manages to catch you underneath your ankle. Go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're going to hurt your foot again, Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to pull most of your body out of the way in time, but it still catches the back of your shoulder blade. You take 40 points of crushing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you are slammed into the ceiling. And as the pillar retracts, you roll off with a heavy wheeze of pain. (groan) Catching onto your feet again. Make one more acrobatics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. If you get crushed to death--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. You manage to-- in the severe pain you're feeling, you can tell there's probably some serious bruising in there and you probably broke a couple of ribs, but you manage to just barely dodge and leap out of the way, making your way across the room to where the staircase descends, out of the immediate danger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you now are standing on the opposite side of this room, which is currently a rotating grinding mill.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to check if there's any kind of device or anything on this side--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, hold on a second, Vax, just chill out for a minute. We all just took a little damage this last time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just trying a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. You can see, in the ceiling, in the very, very center of the room, precariously placed right where one of the pillars in the center slams into the ceiling, there appears to be a small quarter-sized hole, gold piece-sized hole in the ceiling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a clear shot of it or is there (bang bang bang) going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, it's still going. The pillars are still slamming into the roof. And that one hole you see is right where one of the pillars slams into the roof. You only see it intermittently when the pillar retracts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, let's try this first because you might just break it down completely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are much more powerful than I am, Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, can I try to shoot an arrow into the little hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. This is a hard shot because it's at an angle now. We're talking, this is Robin Hood-level split-the-arrow. Because you have to hit it and then ricochet upward to see if it'll have any effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I place my hands on her shoulders--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I give her Enhance Ability.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have advantage on-- oh, ability checks. It's just ability checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ability checks. It's not going to help for an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to offer my beard for a rub of good luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you offer the beard, it tears off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what, I'm going to tie this to the arrow. It's going to give it really good luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not actually going to tie it to the arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to tuck it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mark in your inventory, you now have Fake Grog Rope Beard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a -1 to my confidence now?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So the goal is to shoot an arrow into this-- like the Death Star?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, cool. As I see her ready, I'm going to hold up my hand with my ring and point it right at that hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you can deflect it if I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and you're going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll sing, (sings) Ooh ooh, shut up and shoot that hole! Your arrow is my destiny, yeah I said,

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (sings) Ooh ooh, shut up and shoot that hole! (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, you feel your focus, you wait, you breathe in, you breathe out, you breathe in, you breathe out in pattern with the slamming of the piston against the ceiling.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get it, get it, get it, you're going to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You let out all your breath and you hold, hold, hold, waiting between heartbeats, and then (twwt), release. Go ahead and make your attack roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to roll the fancy one we got last week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. (laughs) Oh, no. Okay. I add my attack bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you release the arrow, you see the pillars slamming. The pillar comes down just as the arrow crests over it, past another pillar that just barely manages to miss it by a segment.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Just to help and guide it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, but it's already gone in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't need it! We don't need it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, let me just see if I got it first!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She rolled a 35, we don't need shit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's going in there, anyway. I don't even have to roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. As the pillar pulls down, the arrow goes cascading forward. Go ahead and make a d20 roll with the +5 modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Okay. So as the arrow makes its way, it ricochets off the bottom edge of the actual hole and immediately bends itself upward, the shaft bending. As it begins to start heading up the hole, there's a sudden force of arcane energy that slams it even harder up into the top of this tiny little slit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it goes up there, you hear what sounds like a splintering of wood and metal. Then you hear metal grinding. You start seeing bits and chunks of grinding metal begin to pour out of the hole and the pillars begin to (scraping stone).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You totally could have done that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could have made that shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, next room, next room's all mine.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That was one of those impossible things, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go across and heal our rogue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As they come to the other side, I clutch my broken rib and injuredly hold a hand up and give a half-assed high-five to my sister. (grunts)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job getting slammed into the roof like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So can we take a short rest to heal up and then also a short rest to take a short rest in real life?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. We're going to go ahead and stop here. You're now taking a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys take a moment. If you want to go ahead and heal up using any of your hit dice, you're able to, Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And on that note, we're going to go ahead and take our five-minute break here, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While the party takes a short rest, we're taking a five-minute rest. We've got to be done by ten tonight with the stream, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we're going to take a five-minute break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orion, if you want to go ahead and come over, we're going to go ahead and give you guys-- yes, sir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, so we're going to go ahead and introduce our guests and give them an overview of the charity that we have currently on the stream tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, I rolled two eights in a row.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to pass this over to Orion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come on over. Gonna enjoy my chickens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't forget to go to Teespring and buy our T-shirts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, let-- no! We haven't even talked about it at all!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes! By the way, our T-shirts are on Teespring. We'll have six more days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They also just went up on our website, on critrole.com. So you can go to our website and find the link.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, guys, we'll see you in a little bit. Meanwhile, take it away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to tweet the Teespring link right now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We had points. We had points. Are we standing for this?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Tell me that for the chat thing. Hi, everybody! Orion Acaba here and Taylor Carol. This is our special guest. And he's with GameChanger, and he has a couple of things to say for this particular awesome charity that we are working with today with SquareEnix and the Deus Ex anniversary.

lines.name: TAYLOR
lines.text: Well, first of all, on behalf of GameChanger, I just want to say what a blast it is to be with you guys. Personally, I've never watched D&D before. You guys have made me a huge fan.

lines.name: TAYLOR
lines.text: A huge thanks to them for partnering with us for this awesome campaign. But yeah, today we go into hospitals and do things called GameChanger days where we go and we bring food for the staff, for the families, for the kids suffering from rare diseases. We bring them gaming packages so they can bond together. We provide college scholarships, and we really just try and provide hope and inspiration-- the same hope and inspiration that games really provided me when I was sick.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. That's awesome. And we here at--

lines.name: TAYLOR
lines.text: Oh, thank you. No, thank you guys.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And we here at Critical Role really love organizations like yours, which is why when we started talking, it was such a nice partnership for you to come on and tell us about this organization. Tell everybody where they can find to help, if they wanted to send to GameChanger.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, where would they go for that, to check it out?

lines.name: TAYLOR
lines.text: You can go online and if you donate anything more than a dollar, you get a free copy, a director's cut--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have-- I don't have that bad of a trek to go through, but it is very inconvenient and painful, but hearing stories like you. I mean, you're 20. He has a beautiful singing voice. He's a singer. And you're going to Harvard, is that what's going on?

lines.name: TAYLOR
lines.text: I am, yeah, I'm a rising junior.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But people like you inspire me, because up until a few months ago, I didn't need any of that kind of inspiration. So it's great, and your organization's great, so we just wanted to thank you for coming on and speaking with everybody and letting everybody know, and we'll be working together in the future, too, and we'll be doing lots of fun stuff, so yeah. Check these guys out, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are you studying at Harvard?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't even know what that means.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hold on a second. Do you mean like you concentrate on English?

lines.name: TAYLOR
lines.text: I love all of your accents.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughs) Any other questions for our guest, guys?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'd like to let everybody know, the mods all have access to the GameChanger command in the chatroom, so if you guys are watching and are not in the chat, just join the chat really quick and you guys will be able to get that link for the donation link to get Deus Ex and anything over a dollar and you get a copy of the game. We're going to go ahead and let that run all the way throughout the rebroadcast and throughout the weekend, so mods, just keep spamming that throughout the chat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So donations tonight are going to GameChanger, yeah?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: It's up to you guys whether or not you want 826LA to go to GameChanger because the link right now just goes to Critical Role, so it's up to you guys for where it goes from there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. I think donations tonight will definitely go to GameChanger, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, so that's what we'll do. Awesome!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell them it's the last day.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And this is our last day. Is that right?

lines.name: TAYLOR
lines.text: Yes, so this is the last day to get your copy--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Okay, then I will not let it run over the weekend.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. But again, dude, thank you for coming on.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And we'll break because I have to pee really bad. But thank you so much.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So guys, just to be clear, all of your donations tonight will go towards GameChanger, but if you want a copy of the game, just go and donate a dollar on the link that we have access to in the chatroom. And just so you guys know, there will not be time for them to read messages tonight after the show. Lucas and I both have to catch a flight, so sorry. We'll get to them next time.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I had a really quick announcement before we get back into the game. The winner is Paula Konito, so congratulations--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: -- and I understand that we crashed their website for donations--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So congratulations, guys, for crashing the website, but what is not crashed is our donation link, so if you scroll down and click on the 826LA link, all of the donations that are made tonight they've said will go to GameChanger

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the portion of the donations that would normally go to 826LA tonight are going to go to GameChanger.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So just scroll down on the channel page, click on 826LA or the donate link that's being spammed in the chat room, and all of those donations will go to GameChanger. And they let us know before they left, they just got 10,000 more Deus Ex keys, so we will let that run throughout the weekend.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So the mods will keep spamming that throughout the weekend and you guys can donate throughout the rebroadcast and things like that for a one-dollar Deus Ex code.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! Thank you guys so much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would be good if you donated more than one dollar, if you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Critters are strong. The Critters are legion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's amazing the things we can do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are Critters in the walls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for being there with me on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so! Back into the fray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, after finishing your short rest, healing up various wounds in that circumstance--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way, playing a fancy little ditty on the flute. You make your way down this long, long staircase. You continue down for, I'd say, probably a good hundred feet or so before you start encountering, I'll say, a mild change in the scenery, at least. What was normally just a musty hallway is becoming thicker and thicker coated with large spiderwebs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to push through and cut through, but it gets to the point where it's just so matted you guys are having to bushwhack your way through as if you had a machete.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not taking off my mask.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I turn to one of those (clears throat) Scalebearers and ask if they've ever dealt with any umber-hulks in this region.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scalebearer Vorak gives kind of a curious look to your question. Scalebearer Desona looks to you and says, "No, I don't believe they exist in this region. Nor this close to the surface, as far "as I know."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are the spiderwebs-- are they becoming more as we traverse--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, they're getting thicker and thicker.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to make my way towards the front of the group because I'm noticing this and I'm going to do a Fire Breath, and I'm going to instantly cast Control Flame and catch as much as I can of it, and start spinning it, burning the webs as we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Very cool. So, Tiberius steps forward and breathes a heating breath of dragon fire out of his mouth. As it cascades forward, burning through the nearby webs, he casts a secondary spell and captures it and begins to shape it, almost like it's a fiery clay in the middle of the air. And he utilizes it in a very similar way to how he uses Telekinesis and begins to use that rolling fire to burn through the webbing as you guys continue down the stairway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It also leaves a terrible stench. Burning web has this awful kind of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's similar. Burnt hair with burnt plastic, if you can think of it-- it's awful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that frickin' sound. Do we-- I can try to cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us, if we want to sneak through here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, that would be good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to try to sneak through?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Pass Without a Trace is cast, while you two both make stealth rolls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, with the Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the Pass Without a Trace, yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (quietly, to Marisha) Is my magic on stealth, too?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus ten from what? Say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth cast Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys dart off to the side, kind of using the remnants of the web to block your physical forms. The boiling fire that has been placed ahead of you is starting to reflect small little points of reflected light throughout the shadows in the distance that are moving towards you as you see giant hairy arachnid legs.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I back up! I have my cloak on. And I'm going to go ahead and cast Stoneskin. That's what I do right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Stoneskin? I'm going to go ahead and ask--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm also going to cast Stoneskin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cast, while they're coming-- where did I write it down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Never mind, I can't find my spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is exciting, guys. There's a board of some sort.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Entangle on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have-- you can cast things?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (quietly) Yeah, she's a ranger, she can cast stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as it's at range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, you've got a beard spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was my terrible joke and I wish I hadn't. Now I'm embarrassed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You can now see skittering off to the side what appear to be a series of large arachnid-like creatures. As you cast Entanglement, you can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and read the spell.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Did I manage to catch with the Control Flame my entire Fire Breath when I did that? And I'm controlling it still?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's not what it was. That's the wrong spell. Sorry, sorry, it's Spike Growth, is the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spike Growth, okay, that is different.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, which is-- the ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point within range twists and sprouts hard spikes and thorns. It's difficult terrain for the duration, but anybody that can see me casting it doesn't take damage to it, it's only the people that don't see me casting it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Any creature that can't see the area at the time the spell is cast must make a wisdom check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, but can they see the area?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, that's not quite the same thing, then, what I saw. (yells) Forget it, my spell is stupid!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's fine, just not in a hallway with stairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine, just stick to arrows, really.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She can do so much more than just arrows!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As I see this, can I release my Control Flame and let the Fire Breath just happen, and not control it anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking into your spell now. Oh, Control Flames is a cantrip. You are able to control just enough fire to burn away the things. It wouldn't actually do any damage if released. Control Fire kind of like captures an element of it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. So that's what I was using, the element of what I did.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So I used it so I could have the fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You set it as a catalyst to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't it mess up the ground if we try to walk through it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they're spiders. They're probably not that wise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Right now everyone rolls initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are only so many things you can do here, Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I know, but I like doing lots of things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not bad! I'll take that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think that should count.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled terribly this time but my stats are good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never rolled a double digit initiative roll, ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Scanlan, but you roll when it counts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just Wil Wheaton roll every time you do initiative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that what we're calling it? Wheatoning?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think that ever happens when it's like damage or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 23. Grog, what have you got?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so we've got Vex, Grog, and Pike, what's your dex? What's your initiative bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to consider that a low initiative.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He just went to go poop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we'll get to his turn when we get to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll for initiative?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get your head out of your ass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I'm going to cast Conjure Barrage at all of the spiders coming at us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Hunter's Mark whatever one looks the biggest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, from this position you will also hit Tiberius to hit all the spiders.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You gotta do what you gotta do. (laughs) Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move to where I'm in the middle of them. I'm still kind of stuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and then I'll Conjure Barrage from there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Hunter's Mark on the biggest one I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, this one here is one of the larger ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and-- Conjure Barrage does what damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do they get a saving throw?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They get-- yes, they do. They get half-damage if they save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mmkay. What's the DC on your spells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (in a funny gruff voice) My DC is 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's yo digits? Gimme those stats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I need to roll for attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the barrage just happens. They're all caught in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So all of them take full damage, except for this one takes half damage, so go ahead and roll the damage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 3d8. 15, and then 20 for the big one with the Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So. So you moved, did that. Do you want to move Trinket as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's a lot of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that, and the spell you cast was an action. Trinket can attack as part of your attack round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I get a second attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, your spell was an action. So that's your turn. You do Conjure Barrage instead of your attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool, I'm going to step back against the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you step back there. Do you want to move Trinket anywhere in particular?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nah, he can't really get anywhere, it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Trinket is there and-- (bear noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Angrily, a growl in the distance. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to hold my turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, how far can I move up to use a Spiritual Weapon? I can't tell where I'm at. I'm sorry, I didn't wear my glasses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can move through your allies without an issue. You can shift through your own guys without a problem.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I would like to cast a golden spiderweb of thorns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be considered a net, if we are considering a weapon that you are conjuring for this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just making it look really pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the effect of this-- I'm letting you hit multiple guys with this. It would not do any damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It wouldn't do any damage, it would just contain them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would possibly have an effect on their ability--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Even if they're thorny? Even like holy thorns? Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be very itchy for them.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. Well, I mean, that's not out of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you should stick with it, it's awesome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Contain them and then somebody could just--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Throw fire, a fireball at them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll a d20 and then add five to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one in the back managed to avoid it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's it? That brings it to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can. I'm going to do Poison Spray, though. Where am I right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right here. Behind Pike as she threw her giant golden net.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to be like, 'scuse me, 'scuse me, Pike, 'scuse me. Sorry, sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes? Oh, go through, go through, go go go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, thank you, thank you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tag you in! Tag you in!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whoosh) Poison Spray! It's a ten-foot cone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten-foot cone. If you want to get right up in here you could get these three there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whoosh) So, it's a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This one succeeds, this one fails, this one fails.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing along with the battle music) It's the music that means we're having a fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, this one succeeds, so no damage, but these two take damage. Go ahead and roll it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so they take 2d12. Six. Ugh. Seven damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not great. I think he takes half damage, though, even though he fails.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does he? I think Poison Mist--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Poison Spray. It's a cantrip. I think it's damage or nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's your move, do you want to keep moving or do you want to stay where you are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get out of everyone's way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're currently-- actually, down from where you cast it, you would be able to move out, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I back up a little bit? Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just kind of want to-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Vax, Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm doing my best seeing from where I can see here. Keyleth is right in front of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She was. She just pulled behind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now you're in front of the spiders.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start with dagger of life stealing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that is four, six, is ten of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then the keen dagger follows. That is a 27.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits for ten damage, and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not Hasted anymore, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're right, forget it, yeah, forget that last. That's right, two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you're off to the side hiding among the slowly burning webbing, you move around, huck both daggers. One strikes a spider right in the center of where its eyes are and it screeches for a second before it curls up, its legs kind of pulling into its torso. The other one begins to pull out of the net that Pike set, and as it does you throw the secondary dagger. It strikes it in its abdomen, and the blade retracts and returns to your belt, and as it does, it leaves this streak of greenish liquid. And you have a better view of these spiders now. Go ahead and make a nature check, both Keyleth and Vex.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: By the way, I'm here, but I'm also there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good, because I rolled an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You notice as most spider-like creatures go, you're used to like the darker, furry, wolf-spider types. These have a different color. Their physical bodies are more white and blue. Their coloration is mostly white but with a kind of bluish hue to it and their eyes are almost pink-white in color.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because they live underground. There's no sunlight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're a very strange, different kind of spider.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that all I know, with my natural 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't encountered too many types of arachnids, but there's something about them that seems loosely themed in the ethereal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You in your experience, you've heard of certain spiders that can travel through the planes rapidly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we don't have to kill it, maybe they just (pfft).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, guys, I think these are like magical bamf-ing spiders.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's one spider that's not caught?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's what, there's three spiders left?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm going to take a couple of shots at it with my Sharpshooter, so let's start with 24 to hit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And let's do this. My first shot--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I get the bonus, so that's 18 points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not too depressing. It's because I'm taking a negative five to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's-- oh, that's not bad. I have new numbers. 16 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three fire damage and 17 as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see there's a burst of flame and a (explosion noise) as its body is knocked in the air, torn asunder, and then consumed by the flame burst at the same time. You see what looks like a scattering of ash across the ground and the steps beneath it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. These two spiders that are currently caught in the net both (whoosh) vanish and the net falls flat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And against Percy, that is a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You both take 13 points of piercing damage

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as all of a sudden, the strange (teleportation noise) sound streaks behind you, you turn over your shoulder just in time to see the spiders pop out of seemingly nowhere and strike into you. The fangs sink into your side and you knock them off with your elbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel the venom extract itself from the fangs, but just as you pull it out of the side, so it actually does not envenom your body. Percy, you're not so lucky. The venom pulses into the side of your shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you feel this burning sensation ripple through your entire upper right torso. You take 21 points of poison damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that all it does, just poison him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are not considered poisoned. It's the damage that's poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends their turn. Tiberius? You're still holding your turn, Grog?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did take Protection From Poison.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should cast that on us.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So we're in a hallway, a stairwell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it's a stairway heading down, essentially, right here, and then it evens out at the bottom point there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 15 feet up to the ceiling. Ten, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as both the spiders are knocked off both Percy and Vex, you guys kind of rear back, ready to defend yourselves. Suddenly the stairwell shakes for a second and pillars of stone go (stone crushing noises) from underneath. Similar to the trap room you encountered earlier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? And what's the DC on your spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Both spiders get mashed pretty horribly into the ceiling. You see where the pillars are slammed into the ceiling permanently. You can see the legs kind of dangling out for a second and then slowly curl in towards where the edge of the stone pillars are at the ceiling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there any corpses that are more accessible than the one that got torched and the ones that are squished?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, are there any spider fangs we can put in the bag?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, because I have that book that helps me do that now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, actually, there are-- there's one that you shot. No, actually, the one that you killed is the one that burst into flame.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, the one that burst into flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an herbalism roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did the book do again, gave me a plus or an advantage? Did it give me an advantage on rolls or like a plus something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I asked you to write that down. I will say advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wait, you did ask me to write it down and I think I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Advantage or a bonus, which of the two is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, no, I didn't write it down, I just wrote that I have the books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say advantage. That's the easiest to remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. You managed to extract two poison glands from one of the spiders. The other ones were too damaged beyond repair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give them to the twins.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we can just use them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She hands you two nasty-looking glands that are still wet with spider ichor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got this for you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want me to hold onto them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's very... that's sweet. I love it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius, would you happen to have a little glass vial or something I could put this in?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think I have two left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm like a Wal-Mart over here. You could have asked me, but that's cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm ready to make my attack turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A little help here, please? Would be nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Oh, wait, I thought you weren't poisoned-- oh, you need healing because you are--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eh, you're fine. Suck it up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I guess we all need some-- what's everybody else at?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, that's what I was at after I healed myself with a handful of hit dice after getting crushed into the ceiling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we took a short break and we're not doing that now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use your hit dice, you'll be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could just use my-- oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys taking a short rest, is that what you're doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let me heal you up, Percy, hold on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I ask a question while she's healing Percy?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We've taken a short rest already, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The grappling arrow I used on the little halfling, I can get that back, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll continue on down the hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, are you still using Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She had to break it to use Stoneskin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a concentration spell, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but I cast Stoneskin on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. All right. So go ahead and make a stealth roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to continue to stealth ahead of the group and also continue checking for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you stealthily move along the side of the wall, Scanlan comes pattering down the stonework.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into what is a large central chamber. You can see webbing scattered throughout the entirety of the stone room. It's about 60 feet up. There is very low light from the flickering sconces that are on the walls of this towards the base of the actual room. The building in the center, it looks almost like an ancient mausoleum structure, how it's placed in the center of the room. Closed stone doors. But what catches your eye is that the entirety of the structure seems to be crafted of the same platinum-like material as the container that you guys are carrying the horn in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there sapphires all over the walls in here, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not the walls of the actual chamber itself, just this central building right there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We're not stealing from this place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception check, anyone who wishes to look for traps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While we're out there, I'm going to check--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh no, that was my big fancy one.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nice. I'm going to check for any arcane stuff and I got--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can gather, as far as the presence of any arcane in this room, the scrolling on the structure in front of you, there are elements of the scrolling that you can see are based in the arcane runes that are used for ritual inscribing, but there's nothing of any magic that you've ever been familiar with that is utilized in this structure. What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, who is moving in? Who wants to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to stealth and move alongside just kind of keep to the edge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you move off to the side, kind of pushing through some of the webs and there's still webs on the side of the room.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll keep close to the guards and the box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I rolled 18 on the stealth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go in close to Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to tail my sister, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (whoosh) You move around over here with your sister.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Trinket's going to stay next to Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So they'll go back to this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you are currently marked as invisible, Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see a spider in here, like a big spider?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's always a big mama spider.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my Primeval Awareness and see if I can sense any spiders in the area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take a moment to concentrate and you sense-- while not in visible range, on the opposite side of this room, a whole bunch of tiny little life sources and one rather large one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Lots of spiders. Lots. I'm going to cast Protection From Poison on myself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm drinking a healing potion right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to do the same thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, I'll go ahead and-- nah, nah, it's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What does a level two healing potion do, again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to keep my Stoneskin up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to go use Greater Invisibility, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. You are also considered invisible.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Because I can cast and still stay invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Kima pushes ahead through the group while you guys are doing this, walks up to the front of the chamber, and you see she takes the holy symbol around from her neck, the symbol of Bahamut, and much like she did to the doorway at the bottom of the temple earlier to find this initial passageway, she feels around in the scrolling and eventually finds a section of it and rotates what looks like a circular part of it that shifts and then pulls out. When she pulls it out, you can see there is a kind of engraving, there is a recessed engraving of the same shape as her holy symbol.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before she touches anything, can I let her know that there's a whole lot of spiders on the other side of the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what? You didn't tell any of us that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I shift to her right flank, just at the corner of the mausoleum structure? Right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just so everybody's aware, those things we just fought? There's a ton more of them on the other side of this little chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good thing you took that beard off because it had bells and shit in it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, the beard is still there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Its most majestic part fell off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There's still some goliath peach fuzz there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, for a moment there, you recess into your old hunter training when you were traveling with your barbarian tribe and you take in the darkness around you and walk, fleet of foot, to the edge of it, not making a single sound. You're damn proud of yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you tell this to Kima, she goes, (whispers) "What? Spiders?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Lots and lots of spiders. Is that going to make noise?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whispers) "I don't know. I haven't been in this chamber before."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In fact, you know what? I'm going to cast Spike Growth on the ground in between where they're going to have to walk through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because they can't freaking see it right now, can they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You said Spike Growth. How much does it affect?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It affects-- damn it-- I didn't put it in my thingy because I'm dumb. I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You're not dumb. You're a strong, smart person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is a 20-foot radius. That's not that much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. So you can do this whole area right here is all spiky growth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's hard spikes. Hard spikes and thorns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, well, I'm going to follow suit and go to the other side and cast Stinking Cloud. No, over--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make another stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the best stealth I've ever done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You quietly come by and mutter under your breath your arcane ritual and all of a sudden (quiet whoosh). And what was the size of the cloud on that one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 30 feet, I think? I think it's 30 feet. Hold on, hold on, hold on. 90 feet! Oh, that's the range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20-foot radius, which would be-- Actually, a 20-foot radius for this would be...

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nice, they have little bard thingies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, they're purple. Mine has like a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This whole area here is done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you also now make a very nasty cloud in this vicinity as well. This whole area is completely marked off on both sides now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to take out my deck of illusions. I'm going to toss two cards both ways, two cards on each side. So I'm going to do this, real quick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Question. That chamber in the center of the room, does it go all the way to the ceiling, or is it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So there's a huge-- so technically, the spiders could crawl up the ceiling and drop down on us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would you give him ideas like that? Just feed him irony!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ten of Hearts, Yes! Joker, Queen of Hearts, and another Joker! What?!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I put two on each side.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. So, like, two over in the spot before all that mess over there and two are in the other mess.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want to go one up top, just in case?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And a female version of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so a secondary Tiberius appears right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, you make a good woman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Female Tiberius appears over on that side.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And then whichever side you decide, a Queen of Hearts and Ten of Hearts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A succubus appears over here. Winged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, what was the other one that you said?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Queen of Hearts and a Ten of Hearts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten of Hearts. A cloud giant on this side of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll use that mini for now, it's fine. All of a sudden appear, kind of translucent, their image flickering. It's not a great illusion, but it's enough where it catches some attention.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And they're positioned right before the messes of each side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Kima's now sitting there like, (whispers) "Put the key in now?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, you're good. Go for it, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She puts her symbol into the recess. As it does, the stone doors shift and there's a dull kind of creaking of the stone as it slides not open, but into the walls, revealing an interior that is, as the light filters in, the entirety of the wall, floor, and ceiling of this room is of the same scrolling, the same platinum/sapphire material as the outside of the building and the box that's there, except for the design seems to all filter in towards the center, like the center of a spiderweb. All the design coalesces to the center point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not an actual spiderweb. There's a raised dais up in the center there, about four feet wide, about a half-foot thick. Kima kind of takes her symbol and puts it back around her neck and kind of motions like this. The two Scalebearers begin to move down, carrying the case, looking about the rest of you like--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I invisibly follow right behind the box, still keeping my illusions in check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm not going to move far away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, if I held-- let me shift one over, just so I'm not in Trinket's way. The other way. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. All right, so. As they enter the chamber, Kima enters as well, you guys filing in behind them, I need you all to make stealth checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Tiberius, with advantage, because you're invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not you, don't worry about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you step into the chamber, losing your footing for a moment on the smooth, kind of platinum-like ridges across the ground, and you kind of catch yourself, your plate hitting the ground with a loud (ting) sound, at which point the two Scalebearers kind of look at you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it does, you can see the sapphire bits that are ingrained on this box flash with a bright blue light and all of a sudden the blue energy spreads into the ceiling and the floor of this room and all of the blue and silver veins that are carved into this begin to glow with a similar blue light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the doors begin to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doors you guys entered this room through begin to close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys immediately scootch out of the way. Kima darts off. Both of them turn around and start running back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both manage to just squeeze through real fast as the doors slam behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you see a series of spiders beginning to try to cut around-- these here, what's the DC on your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17, because I didn't do it through the hand cone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of these spiders get disoriented and try to find their way through the Stinking Cloud, kind of like (choking, clicking noises).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, who's going to be back down here, theoretically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None of them make their way through. The rest of these begin coming forward-- what's the roll they have to make for the Spiky Growth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To repair the room that we broke, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Both missed their save. What's the damage on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 2d4 for every five feet crossed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They would probably be skittering around here halfway through before they changed trajectory, so-- 1d4, 2d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They come charging around the corner rapidly (skittering noises).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My little sister once fell into a rose bush.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Good story? (laughs) I once fell into a fire ant hill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see, crawling up over the top of this structure, one large white and bluish spider that leaps up. As this is happening, you guys are noticing that blue energy is cracking through the floor and now following the pattern across the entirety of the structure. It crawls up the walls--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and that blue energy reaches to the ceiling and illuminates it. And what you missed when you entered the room is you can see, recessed into the ceiling of this room, four large humanoid entities that are just currently held aloft, buried in the ceiling, of platinum armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got to go. We've got to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just (spider screech, croak) screeching sound, the spider slowly tries to curl in place, the giant platinum golem now slamming on top and squishing on top. You see as it slowly comes to stand, each hand holding these giant platinum cleavers. You suddenly hear a voice ringing through your heads collectively: "Get out."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You heard the man! You heard him! You heard him! The earrings, everybody heard him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, can we just leave the thing here with the golem?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's going to kill everything there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so all of you guys start bolting out. I want everyone to go ahead and make a dexterity check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, anyone lower than a ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone? All right. You as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So all of you guys come running out of the room--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, yeah, that'll hit. You see the blade streak across the front of her silver armor. She takes 24 points of slashing damage. It sends her flying back ten feet with the sheer force of it, but she manages to roll out of it, yeah! With an acrobatics check, catching herself to her feet and just keeps bolting behind the rest of you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through this, we're now going into a skill challenge as you guys are rushing out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Must go faster. Must go faster.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, all right. Run for your life.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We haven't done this in a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, as you're running to get through, there's still bits of webbing still in the way. I need everyone to go ahead and make another dexterity check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you guys are all charging up, kind of helping each other but also clamoring to get through, Kima is rushing up and you can see where one of the Scalebearers has now tripped and fallen on the stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She runs past, leans back to reach her hand out as the golem comes up behind--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- with two hands, swings down with both blades.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is against one of the Scalebearers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I be rolling for Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm considering Trinket with you, so no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a lot of things to consider. One of them hits the stone and just streaks off, sparks flying through the air, illuminating the space secondarily. However, the other Scalebearer takes 28 points of slashing damage from the blow. As it reaches up again for a second blow, Kima reaches down and grabs Desona's arm and lifts her up off her feet and they both go charging forward. You guys make your way up the stairway as you see now the golem pushing its way through.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to dissipate my card illusion and I'm going to cast Fly on myself, so I'm hovering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much of a gap is there between the last trailing-behind Scalebearer and the golem?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, now that Kima's got them, they're rushing up and there's about a ten-foot, 15-foot gap now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to turn around and do Wall of Stone. Boof!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As they rush past, a wall of stone slams up as the golem goes smashing into it--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll do support. I'll do Obelisk right behind it, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you guys come rushing up to the top of this, you guys are just doing the stone wall, obelisk, obelisk, obelisk. We'll say you cast it twice to go ahead and reinforce.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear stone crack and break and you see two of the pillars that you put up impact, dust and bits of rock shoot out, but it settles. Apparently it's holding strong and you start hearing slamming of some sort of heavy weight behind it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As well as the following of additional giant heavy footsteps. It's now got its reinforcements caught up to it. You guys charge into the room with the broken trap, which now has partially raised platforms. You're rushing around and trying to find your way through. You get to the other side of the room. There's now an entirety-- a room filled with mist in front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have it. I can Gust of Wind. That's my last 3rd-level spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, Gust of Wind. I'm going to ask all of you guys to make a wisdom check as you rush through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Saving throw or just your ability modifier?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I thought it was negative three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you guys are pushing through. So, as you guys come rushing in you're like, go go! You see Keyleth's focusing and getting the wind to escape, Keyleth rushes up, Kima comes through with the two Scalebearers, everyone comes through, Grog's bringing up the back. You can see now, in the back behind him, a giant blade-wielding fist as the golem comes smashing through the wall. The rest of you guys, ushering Grog along, Grog comes running, hears the sound, looks over his shoulder and in the chaos of it, his trajectory is off and he ends up brushing into the side of the mist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You end up taking 24 points of fire damage as the pillars spin, unleashing a torrent of flame.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, bad car wash, bad car wash!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, Grog, your beard has been singed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys charge up the rest of the staircase--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is Grog behind us now, like the furthest away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just caught up to you guys as you're rushing up the staircase. You get to the final door. You exit. As Kima rushes everyone through, she brings out her holy symbol real fast, and as she pulls it off her neck, you see the first golem reach the bottom of the staircase. It begins looming up--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We're leaving! What are you doing?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, go home! Go home! Bad golem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima takes out her holy symbol and holds it aloft in front of her and says under her breath (murmurs), at which point it begins to glow with this extremely vibrant glow. As it does, you see a symbol emblazoned on the front of the golem and it flashes with light as it stops and just kind of holds its place-- and waits. And Kima looks at the symbol like "I wasn't sure that was going to "work." She takes--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Tell it to go kill the spider.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doors slowly seal shut once again. She pulls the symbol out-- and she falls to her knees, breathing heavily.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I agree, Grog. Very well said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It kind of happened very quickly, I'm sorry."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, do some people need to be healed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm all right. I'm all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Grog's got a burnt face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I want to wear this pain as a remembrance of my beard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can grow it back, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way back up to the main chamber, where High Bearer Vord is currently waiting for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns to you as you enter. "So I am to assume that your journey was a success?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, surprisingly so. It went off without a hitch. Well, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got some good security down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I told you. Once it's instilled, it will be safe."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A little warning next time would be great.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You're really a girl on fire now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That really heals me up, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will top me off very nicely.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well done, everyone, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the High Bearer Vord kind of raises his hand. "Yonn, if you do not mind." And Yonn kind of shuffles forward.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It was a play on words. Your name also means something that you do when you're tired.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches out and puts a big old sack of coins in your hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should mention, you may have to have one of the rooms repaired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A little broken. We thought were maybe just disarming it but I think we probably broke it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We put an arrow into it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (tearfully) If you find the remnants of a glorious beard, preserve it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I try to smush it onto his chin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the High Bearer turns to you, Pike. "Mighty cleric, I see this meeting, "though it escaped my vision before, that you bear the holy sigil of the Dawnflower, the Lady of "Redemption Herself. While we may walk under different stars, I offer these words that caught "my ear naught but a week ago. In an excavation beneath the toppled tower of Syrac, the "long-cursed ruin that sat like a blemish upon this city for hundreds of years, it was revealed that "perhaps the five holy paths that began here at Vasselheim, there may indeed now be a sixth."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A forgotten temple to Sarenrae has been uncovered. Crumbled, lost, and without light, it "sat, forever and a day, and few are around in this city of her guiding flame to recover and restore "its glory. Perhaps you should look into it."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will gladly look into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The ruin lies to the west of here, at the base of the city's mountain. Look for the dark "stone ruin. Nevertheless, I thank you for your time. Kima, if you wouldn't mind, we have some "things to discuss as well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vord? You wouldn't have happened to hear of maybe a druid tribe called the Fire Ashari? They call their little hometown Pyrah. Do you happen to know, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a keen look and says, "There has been talk of a rogue band of druids, not more "than two day's travel, in the-- let's see, where did I put the maps here?" He thinks to himself for a moment, considering it. "Towards the Sunder Peak Mountain Range. Dangerous territory, fraught with "volcanic activity. Yet these folks seem to call it home."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Sunder Peak like west or east to where we--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Southwest of the city. It's hard to miss."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look for the plumes of sulfurous smoke."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the temple to Sarenrae on the way to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The temple to Sarenrae is on the same mountain that this temple is built on."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To the west of here. Follow the mountain base."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. So we can stop there first?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Before we part, you seem to be quite learned about many things that I am not. Have you ever heard of anything called the God's Hammer or the Pale Stone? Or any particular artifact, Ropes of Mercy, perhaps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I shall keep this in mind, should the information come my way."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a look, a quick glance, and notes: "For the record, while your color is not "what it was when you first entered, know that the great Platinum Dragon sees through this guise to "the heart beneath."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, thank you for noticing. I agree with the same sentiment. And I bow in the Draconic fashion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, Kima. Business. Thank you all very much." And he kind of lends his hands out. As he extends his hand, the doors on the opposite side of the room open up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all in the process of collecting and setting aside and cleaning up various things that have been recovered from this temple. You immediately see against the brass structure the very simplified symbol of the wings of Sarenrae, multiple times across the structure in various incarnations. This is very much indeed a lost temple of Sarenrae.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, when you've fully excavated it, you can come back and check it out.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Or you can stay here and restore it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the older woman sees you guys walk down and says, "Please! There's nothing "to take. Nothing but history and rock, I guarantee you. Bandits are not welcome here."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No no no! I take out my symbol and I say, no no no, I'm here to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My name is Gesyra, a simple painter, but one of, as far as I know, the three devoted to the Lady of "the Everlight here in Vasselheim. And now a fourth. I don't know where you came from, but "would you stay with us for a bit and help us rebuild? Bring her name into the light amongst the "others here in Vasselheim? Restore it to its glory?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (tearfully) Yes. Oh, man, I don't want to leave you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, Pike, you get to turn to the rest of the group.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I think this is a pilgrimage I have to take. So, Vox Machina, keep your eyes out. I will contact you every once in a while if I can, and we will meet up once this is completed. All in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Vox Machina on three. One, two, three.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (tearfully) You will be missed very much, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to miss you guys very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A wonderful television series she has recurring. We're really happy and proud of her-- we're just a jumble of emotions under the circumstances.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You guys have been so amazing and have made this experience even better for us, and thank you so much for going with us on our journey. It will keep going, but I will be back when I can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But it might be a long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she'll pop in and out if she can, and there will eventually be a return of Pike, but for the time being she feels the calling to stay and help rebuild this temple of Sarenrae.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to miss you, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to miss you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Emotionally I will wait for you, and I will not stray emotionally. I will always be there for you emotionally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But physically, I mean, come on, it's going to be months.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much, Ash. We're going to miss you but we'll tabs and we'll have you back soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Thank you all so much for watching. Everyone give Ashley love on the Twitter, on the internet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we'll see you guys at Comic-Con next week. Those that'll be at Anime Expo, I'll be there tomorrow for a couple of panels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six more days for the Critical Role shirts before they go away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, it's still got Pike on it, you gotta get it now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see you-- me and Marisha will see you in three weeks.
